description.value:
With an unnerving, croaking breath, you draw the magic out of a creature. A spell is randomly selected from the highest-rank spells the foe knows that have a target or area, to a maximum of 3rd-rank spells; the target makes a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected

Success The chosen spell is suppressed for 1 round, and cannot be cast

Failure The chosen spell is lost, as though the target had cast the spell themself

Critical Failure The chosen spell, as well as another random spell of the same rank or lower, is lost, as though the target had cast the spell themself.

Heightened (+1) The maximum rank of spell that can be affected increases by 1.

target.value: 1 creature with prepared, spontaneous, or innate spells
